name: Funky Kong Gives You Beanbux: Creppy Edition
name_original: Funky Kong Gives You Beanbux: Creppy Edition
description:
Funky Kong Gives You Beanbux: Creppy Edition Is a game where you... well... Get beanbux! With ten  Eight ;) Endings! This game is still in BETA, Incomplete! More (might) Be added! 

BETA 0.725 PATCH NOTES:

Bug fixes. 

Removed Herobrine.

BETA 0.72 PATCH NOTES:

Fixed the pig breaking the game.

Added Trophies!

Added 4 Endings!

Progress Board:

https://trello.com/b/6U5Kdv8G/fkgybce-progress

Ideas? Submit here!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1dIr53NA158DatxkXYeRYbj3UOsnoWeZzMh-0k3O4zj4/edi...

And oh yeah, don't let creppy come !!!!
